content: प्रशस्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Praise, eulogy, laudation. {@--2@} Description; <ls>U. 7.</ls> {@--3@} A panegyric or small poem written in praise of any one ({%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} a patron.). {@--4@} Excellence, eminence. {@--5@} Bonediction. {@--6@} Guidance, instruction, rule for guidance; as in लेखप्रशस्तिः ‘a form of writing’.
